name: STICC: Drawing of a Thousand Papers
name_original: STICC: Drawing of a Thousand Papers
description:
A legend about a stickfigure...

Sticc: Drawing of a Thousand Papers is a platformer, in which you play as Sticc, a stickfigure looking to save the world after something terrible had happened...

-- CONTROLS --

Arrow Keys - Move, Navigate menus (Left and Right), Jump (Up)
